column1: Local Foods////When you first walk in
column2: you'd probably have the same reaction as I do. Dayum the prices are really high. 11 dollars for a sandwich and 2 slides? I swear I was about to just walk straight out and just eat lunch at a fast food joint nearby. But this has to be one of my all time places to get a bite in Houston
column3: and the same for other yelpers.
